summary: In this sequel to El lago azul (1980), two children are stranded on a beautiful island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together and eventually become suntanned teenagers in love.
cast: Milla Jovovich|Brian Krause|Lisa Pelikan|Courtney Barilla|Garette Ratliff Henson|Emma James|Jackson Barton|Nana Coburn|Brian Blain|Peter Hehir|Alexander Petersons|John Mann|Wayne Pygram|John Dicks|Gus Mercurio|John Turnbull|Todd Rippon|John Keightley|Pita Degei|Mikaele Nasau|Annabel Graham
title: Regreso al lago azul
